1. Starting Act
2. Story
3. Red Block Zone
4. Morning Mist
5. Piano Ambience

7. Forest Vibes
8. Peaceful Clouds
9. Simple Piano
10. Lazy Waltz
11. Afternoon
12. Game Wave
